body.name: Portable Stroller Fan with Mist, Rechargeable Misting Fan with Water Spray, 270° Pivot Personal Mister Fan with Flexible Tripods for Cooling Outdoor Travel Beach Umbrella Wagon Crib Treadmill Car

features: CooL Moisture Breeze: This innovative portable stroller misting fan combines the functions of spraying and blowing perfectly, giving you the perfect blend of cooling and mist. You can experience an oasis of comfort even on the hottest days, no matter where you are, by taking a leisurely walk, relaxing on the beach, picnicking in the park, or traveling outside.

Upgraded Flexible Tripod: Designed with upgraded 7" long bendable legs for this stroller mister fan, it takes flexibility to a whole new level, making it a breeze to attach to various objects, such as baby strollers, wagons, car seats, cribs, etc., or hang it on a tree branch during your outdoor adventures. The possibilities are only limited by your imagination!

Tiny Yet Powerful: Our this battery-operated fan proves that size doesn't determine strength, as this small fan packs a punch when it comes to airflow. With 3 adjustable speed settings, you have full control over the intensity of the breeze, and its compact size makes it ideal for travel, fitting easily into your bag or backpack. Stay cool on the go and create your own cool summer.

360°Adjustable Pivots: Equipped with 360° adjustable pivots for our cordless travel fan, experience the ultimate in versatility and control with its horizontal 360° and vertical 270° adjustable angles, allowing you to direct the airflow exactly where you need it. Say goodbye to stagnant air and embrace the freedom to customize your cooling experience.

Rechargeable Battery: With a built-in 2500mAh battery for this rechargeable fan that supports an impressive 10 hours of use, it ensures you have all-day fun at places like Disneyland, parks, and various other venues. With a convenient charging feature that lets you fully recharge it in 3.5 hours, choose our portable wireless fan for a hassle-free and enjoyable experience!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Have you ever felt terrible when your child is screaming in the stroller because of the heat? Have you ever lost control of yourself when your beloved child sits in the backseat complaining about the heat and becomes irritable? We are here to help you out! Our designer figured out a solution to the dilemma that even though there’s a fan blowing, the air is still hot. It's 5.4 inches and comes with 3 speeds for different purposes: powerful wind yet whisper-working. We add a water tank (50 ml capacity) on the top of the fan, and when the weather becomes unbearable, just turn on the misting function. It sprays for 5 minutes, then stops for 5 minutes and repeats for about 3 hours continuously, and the fan could work about 2/6/10H at 3 different speeds. All our products are brand new. It is normal that there may be some water drop left in the tank due to the misting function test before shipping. The input of this fan is 5V/1A; you could also charge it with a 5V/1A or 5V/2A adapter. To protect the battery, please unplug the cable while it is fully charged. Besides, please charge this fan once every month in order to maintain the service life of the product if it is not used for a long time. Note: Please unplug the power isolation tab before using the product. To avoid clogging the spray holes, be sure to add pure water to the container. For a better experience and proper spray function, it is recommended to keep the water tank on top when using the spray function. You can download product guides and documents for more product information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bigger than I imagined & very powerful!
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with my purchase of this misting fan for my infant daughters stroller & carseat! The fan is pretty big so it has no problem fanning baby off on a very hot, muggy day! It's also very powerful and the mist is perfect. You can barely feel the water! Crossing my fingers the battery life is as it states for being long lasting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little fan and mister!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for the stray cats outside we live in Florida it’s been so hot! The legs are great I wrapped the legs around the porch pole it worked great! Even though it’s small it’s powerful and the mister is so cool even my husband was impressed he loved it! The only thing is trying to figure out the buttons to mist or run the fan. What a great deal too! It has actually helped cool the air more by the porch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a really good fan . Used it 4 times before the silver charging port inside the fan broke off so now I’m unable to charge it :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Light mist so it doesn’t feel like you’re being drenched. When it works, it’s great but the automatic timer functionality doesn’t seem to work. There are times when you push the button for mister and it doesn’t work or it takes a while for it to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow. The mist is really cool
reviews.reviewText: The multi speed fan works great. Powered by USB plug...and charges fast. What really rocks is the mist option. There is a water bottle. Fill it up and just put water in the reservoir. There is a separate water mist button and a very cool mist comes out. You don't have to use the fan with the mist. I liked using it separately so I could feel how well it worked. The legs are adjustable. The mist is pretty quiet. So you could use it in more of a stealth mode if needed. This fan has lights that change color when charging and fully charged. It is portable. Nice looking. And so so cool. I do not know how they get it so cool. Wow! Winner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really nice! Screws become loose the more you remove and move!
reviews.reviewText: We bought 2 of these and I love them! The fans can easily mount to anything! Charging makes it so easy to keep the battery up! The misting works great and those fan settings actually do something! It’s so nice I can use it as a hand held fan as well!I took away 2 stars because I have spent multiple times re-tightening the small screws that attach the fan head to the legs. It’s a pain because in order to fit my screw driver in, I have to take off the side screws for the head and then remove the fan head… all just to tighten the fan head base to the legs… but other than that they have worked perfectly! I would buy again, especially for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent fan! I liked the breeze option
reviews.reviewText: Excellent fan! I liked the breeze option

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Want to love it
reviews.reviewText: We want to love this fan because it works well + mist feature & multifunctional (clasp to stroller, car seat, etc), but it’s the 2nd one that broke (the screw holding together) after the return window (only 1 month) closed…so have wasted $50 on two of these fans.
